text: Talwandi Sabo Assembly Constituency (Sl. No.: 94) is a Punjab Legislative Assembly constituency in Bathinda district, Punjab state, India. ==Member of Legislative Assembly== * 2017: Baljinder Kaur, AAP *2014 (bypoll): Jeetmohinder Singh Sidhu, SAD * 2012: Jeetmohinder Singh Sidhu, INC * 2007: Jeetmohinder Singh Sidhu, INC * 2002: Jeetmohinder Singh Sidhu, INC ==References== Category:Assembly constituencies of Punjab, India Category:Bathinda district
title: Talwandi Sabo Assembly Constituency
